abstract: Details are available on how Apple customers can sign up for a free bumper or case for their iPhone 4.
snippet: Details are available on how Apple customers can sign up for a free bumper or case for their iPhone 4.
lead_paragraph: When Steven P. Jobs, Apple’s chief executive, said the company would offer free iPhone 4 bumpers and cases, he didn’t mention there would be an app for that. But of course, there is.

headline.main: How to Get Your Free iPhone Bumper

abstract: This being the iPhone, there was plenty of speculation as to why Apple is taking so long to produce a white model.
snippet: This being the iPhone, there was plenty of speculation as to why Apple is taking so long to produce a white model.
lead_paragraph: Just a week after Steven P. Jobs, the chief executive of Apple, promised that the already delayed white iPhone 4 would be available by the end of July, Apple said that the device would be delayed again.

headline.main: What’s Behind the White iPhone 4 Delays?
